name: Gem Drop (Game.Play())
description:
Collect gems in the crates to progress through the dangerous caves!

A/D or Left/Right to move

SPACE to drop gem

Collect 3 gems to progress

TAB to pause

Assets:
Sunnyland by Ansimuz

Cartoon FX Remaster Free by Jean Moreno

UI Pack by Kenney

Kenney Fonts by Kenney

Music:
Rhythmic Game Music Ambience by PatrickLieberkind

Video Game 7 by djgriffin

Sound FX:

Clink by TechGkN

LIGHTBULB SMASH 002 by sandyrb

Chimes Sparkle by lukabea

CollectCoin by bradwesson
